32 
34 
40 class subscribe_options
41 {
43  MQTTSubscribe_options opts_;
44 
45  friend class async_client;
46  friend class response_options;
47  friend class subscribe_options_test;
48 
49 public:
51  using ptr_t = std::shared_ptr<subscribe_options>;
53  using const_ptr_t = std::shared_ptr<const subscribe_options>;
54 
56  static constexpr bool SUBSCRIBE_NO_LOCAL = true;
58  static constexpr bool SUBSCRIBE_LOCAL = false;
59 
64  static constexpr bool NO_RETAIN_AS_PUBLISHED = false;
66  static constexpr bool RETAIN_AS_PUBLISHED = true;
67 
69  enum RetainHandling {
71  SEND_RETAINED_ON_SUBSCRIBE = 0,
73  SEND_RETAINED_ON_NEW = 1,
75  DONT_SEND_RETAINED = 2
76  };
77 
83  subscribe_options()
84  : opts_(MQTTSubscribe_options_initializer) {}
98  explicit subscribe_options(bool noLocal, byte retainAsPublished=false,
99  RetainHandling retainHandling=SEND_RETAINED_ON_SUBSCRIBE)
100  : opts_(MQTTSubscribe_options_initializer) {
101  opts_.noLocal = noLocal ? 1 : 0;
102  opts_.retainAsPublished = retainAsPublished ? 1 : 0;
103  opts_.retainHandling = (unsigned char) retainHandling;
104  }
110  bool get_no_local() const {
111  return to_bool(opts_.noLocal);
112  }
118  void set_no_local(bool on=true) {
119  opts_.noLocal = on ? 1 : 0;
120  }
126  bool get_retain_as_published() const {
127  return to_bool(opts_.retainAsPublished);
128  }
134  void set_retain_as_published(bool on) {
135  opts_.retainAsPublished = on ? 1 : 0;
136  }
145  auto get_retain_handling() const -> RetainHandling {
146  return RetainHandling(opts_.retainHandling);
147  }
156  void set_retain_handling(RetainHandling retainHandling) {
157  opts_.retainHandling = (unsigned char) retainHandling;
158  }
159 };
160 
161 
163 using subscribe_options_ptr = subscribe_options::ptr_t;
164 
166 // end namespace mqtt
167 }
